item.title: Progressive Delivery with Argo-rollouts
item.description: What is progressive delivery? There are various definitions of ‘progressive delivery’ so I’ll go with the one I find to be the most concise via devopsinsitute Progressive delivery is the process of pushing changes to a product iteratively, first to a small audience and then to increasingly larger audiences to maintain quality control. Progressive Delivery is a modified version of Continuous Delivery There are a few options for implementing progressive delivery within a kubernetes cluster (see also flagger).
